20101225140208.000|20101225140209.667|TR0|under blankets to keep the cold
20101225140209.667|20101225140211.333|TR0|out - and the smoke in.
20101225140211.333|20101225140213.000|TR0|
20101225140213.000|20101225140214.667|TR0|21-year-old Assadullah started
20101225140214.667|20101225140216.333|TR0|smoking heroin at university.
20101225140216.333|20101225140218.000|TR0|Six months later, he dropped out
20101225140218.000|20101225140220.000|TR0|and does what he can to support
20101225140220.000|20101225140222.000|TR0|his habit. He is one of the one
20101225140222.000|20101225140224.000|TR0|million addicts in this country
20101225140224.000|20101225140226.000|TR0|- the worlds largest producer
20101225140226.000|20101225140228.000|TR0|of opium.
20101225140228.000|20101225140230.000|TR0|
20101225140230.000|20101225140232.000|TR0|ASSADULLAH / DRUG ADDICT My life
20101225140232.000|20101225140234.000|TR0|resolves around this drug. I
20101225140234.000|20101225140236.000|TR0|know its killing me but I cant
20101225140236.000|20101225140238.000|TR0|stop.
20101225140238.000|20101225140240.000|TR0|
20101225140240.000|20101225140242.000|TR0|Anti-drug measures have
20101225140242.000|20101225140244.000|TR0|diminished output, But a hit
20101225140244.000|20101225140246.000|TR0|only costs 2 dollars, providing
20101225140246.000|20101225140248.000|TR0|an escape for addicts ranging
20101225140248.000|20101225140249.667|TR0|from refugees returning from
20101225140249.667|20101225140251.333|TR0|Iran who fled the country's
20101225140251.333|20101225140253.000|TR0|civil war to military veterans,

20101225140256.333|20101225140258.000|TR0|drug says it is another threat
20101225140258.000|20101225140300.000|TR0|to Afghanistans long-term
20101225140300.000|20101225140302.000|TR0|economic growth and security.
20101225140302.000|20101225140304.000|TR0|
20101225140304.000|20101225140306.000|TR0|JEAN-LUC LEMAHIEU / UNITED
20101225140306.000|20101225140308.000|TR0|NATIONS OFFICE ON DRUGS AND
20101225140308.000|20101225140310.000|TR0|CRIME " It's what we call a
20101225140310.000|20101225140312.000|TR0|coca-cola effect. I mean people
20101225140312.000|20101225140314.000|TR0|always talk about the demand
20101225140314.000|20101225140316.000|TR0|creating supply, but people
20101225140316.000|20101225140318.000|TR0|forget that demand creates
20101225140318.000|20101225140319.667|TR0|supply. That's exactly happening
20101225140319.667|20101225140321.333|TR0|in Afghanistan. HIV is often
20101225140321.333|20101225140323.000|TR0|starting among injecting drug
20101225140323.000|20101225140324.667|TR0|users. It has as well to do with
20101225140324.667|20101225140326.333|TR0|security forces and high levels
20101225140326.333|20101225140328.000|TR0|of addiction in the security
20101225140328.000|20101225140330.000|TR0|forces. That means you corrupt
20101225140330.000|20101225140332.000|TR0|your security system.  So all
20101225140332.000|20101225140334.000|TR0|together this means it is a
20101225140334.000|20101225140336.000|TR0|heavy burden for this country."
20101225140336.000|20101225140338.000|TR0|
20101225140338.000|20101225140340.000|TR0|Locals say the addicts steal and
20101225140340.000|20101225140342.000|TR0|threaten them and the police do
20101225140342.000|20101225140344.000|TR0|nothing more than chase them
20101225140344.000|20101225140346.000|TR0|away or throw them in jail for a
20101225140346.000|20101225140348.000|TR0|day or two. Then they come right
20101225140348.000|20101225140350.000|TR0|back.
20101225140350.000|20101225140352.000|TR0|
20101225140352.000|20101225140354.000|TR0|STAND-UP: There are an estimated
20101225140354.000|20101225140356.000|TR0|60,000 heroin addicts in Kabul -
20101225140356.000|20101225140358.000|TR0|and that figure is rising fast.
20101225140358.000|20101225140359.667|TR0|Many say they want help. But the
20101225140359.667|20101225140401.333|TR0|Afghan government can do little
20101225140401.333|20101225140403.000|TR0|for them. And the handful of
20101225140403.000|20101225140404.667|TR0|rehabilitation clinics have only
20101225140404.667|20101225140406.333|TR0|a few hundred beds to offer.
20101225140406.333|20101225140408.000|TR0|
20101225140408.000|20101225140410.000|TR0|The UN-funded Nejat Center is
20101225140410.000|20101225140412.000|TR0|the largest facility in the
20101225140412.000|20101225140414.000|TR0|capital, but thats not saying
20101225140414.000|20101225140416.000|TR0|much: It can only handle 60
20101225140416.000|20101225140418.000|TR0|patients at a time.
20101225140418.000|20101225140420.000|TR0|
20101225140420.000|20101225140422.000|TR0|To enter, addicts must submit to
20101225140422.000|20101225140424.000|TR0|a two-months detoxification.

20101225140426.000|20101225140428.000|TR0|But the centers director,
20101225140428.000|20101225140430.000|TR0|Dr.Wahidullah Kashan, says a
20101225140430.000|20101225140432.000|TR0|lack of post-treatment prospects
20101225140432.000|20101225140434.000|TR0|ensure that over half of
20101225140434.000|20101225140436.000|TR0|patients fall off the wagon.

20101225141746.000|20101225141748.000|TR0|ANGULI DZHIBLADZE / FORMER

20101225141756.333|20101225141758.000|TR0|got my flat. Today we have
20101225141758.000|20101225141800.000|TR0|nobody to take care of us. We're

20101225141804.000|20101225141806.000|TR0|
20101225141806.000|20101225141808.000|TR0|ARCHIVE, GORI, GEORGIA
20101225141808.000|20101225141810.000|TR0|
20101225141810.000|20101225141812.000|TR0|For people like Anguli the

20101225141824.000|20101225141826.000|TR0|They have had to sit by and
